title: Villains Are Destined to Die, Vol. 6
description: "All this time you were emphasizing trust, and yet you had not one drop of faith in me."This wretched game is just one curveball after another! Not only are affection meters now locked behind a paywall, but Ivonne's appearance is also only weeks outâ€”meaning Penelope has to work double-time to secure an ending with her chosen man Eckles. The problem? Though his affection is getting high, his jealousy equally abounds. So when Winter proposes she join him for volunteer work, Penelope jumps at the chance to regain some control over her situation. Little does she expect to run into Callisto there too! But danger is afoot, and the crown prince is not the only familiar face Penelope is destined to meet...
author: SUOL
